Description: Rectangular wooden writing-board with 6 holes pierced around lower edges. The Coptic text contains a 'Prayer of evening offering of incense and intercession for the Nile flood.'
Curator's comments: Studied with a view to publication by Mihálykó, 2021.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.138, pl.100)
Hasitzka 1990 / Neue Texte und Dokumentation zum Koptisch-Unterricht (p.128)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. I 100:7 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
Miscellaneous number: O.Rain.UnterrichtKopt. 197 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2006)
